channel.title: Urgent please help 317
channel.description:
MY client's, crown system is messed up, and i cant figure out how to make each crown show in the right spots.
Currently all crowns show the right crown to other players mod works fully with pm and and all
Admin's show owner crown for that player but admin for others-pm's show owner
Owner works for both, but pm's show donor
and donors, show admin for that player, but show donor for others, and pm are invisible.
If anyone is willing, to Teamview me, i would, and the rest of my developers, would greatly, appriecated, it., and i will give, massive thanks, and credits. Please help this is urgent, and i need this done fast.
Theres only one section that uses "cr" in client.java and that is configured right. Please help
I've checked at all tut,s etc, and none of them fit, what i have

item.title: Urgent please help 317
